member.name: M:Siemens.Runtime.HmiUnified.ILoggedTag.Read(System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Read the logged data synchronously from the PH system.
member.param: Start timestamp for the oldest LoggedProcessValues
End timestamp for the oldest LoggedProcessValues
When boundingValue is set to true, the lower and the upper boundingValue is returned beside the values between start and end time.

member.summary: Sets the name of the tag.

member.summary: Read raw historical data synchronous from the PH system.
member.param: Timestamp for the oldest logged process values.
Timestamp for the newest logged process values.
When boundingValue is set to true, the lower and the upper boundingValue is returned beside the values between start and end time.

Timestamp for the newest logged process values.
When boundingValue is set to true, the lower and the upper boundingValue is returned beside the values between start and end time.

member.summary: Removes the specified tag by name.

member.name: M:Siemens.Runtime.HmiUnified.ILoggedTagSet.Subscribe
member.summary: This function is intended to be used to update the client software with new data as it becomes available; e.g. update a trend with new data on a periodic basis.
